attr_information.Bundle.implicitRules: A reference to a set of rules that were followed when the resource was constructed, and which must be understood when processing the content. Often, this is a reference to an implementation guide that defines the special rules along with other profiles etc.
attr_information.Bundle.id: The logical id of the resource, as used in the URL for the resource. Once assigned, this value never changes.
attr_information.Bundle.meta: The metadata about the resource. This is content that is maintained by the infrastructure. Changes to the content might not always be associated with version changes to the resource.
attr_information.Bundle.identifier: A persistent identifier for the bundle that won't change as a bundle is copied from server to server.
attr_information.Bundle.timestamp: The date/time that the bundle was assembled - i.e. when the resources were placed in the bundle.
attr_information.Bundle.entry: An entry in a bundle resource - will either contain a resource or information about a resource (transactions and history only).
attr_information.Bundle.signature: Digital Signature - base64 encoded. XML-DSig or a JWT.
attr_information.Bundle.language: The base language in which the resource is written.
attr_information.Bundle.type: Indicates the purpose of this bundle - how it is intended to be used.
attr_information.Bundle.total: If a set of search matches, this is the total number of entries of type 'match' across all pages in the search.  It does not include search.mode = 'include' or 'outcome' entries and it does not provide a count of the number of entries in the Bundle.
attr_information.Bundle.link: A series of links that provide context to this bundle.
